title: (VIDEO) Protest close to Carlton House in Tangalle; large crowd scuffles with police
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A large crowd gathered at the road leading to Carlton House in Tangalle on Monday (4) morning to protest against the government.
Carlton House is considered as the private residence of the Rajapaksa Family.
The protestors were demanding the government resign and also against the mismanagement of the economy.
(VIDEO) Protest close to Carlton House in Tangalle; large crowd scuffles with police
